title: Blended Learning-Based Foundational English Education Program: Short-Intensive Program for Science Field Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and conversational English comprehension at an everyday level
context.additional_context: Requires establishing a VR-based simulation learning environment and ensuring accessibility centered on mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize 200 core English vocabulary terms related to science-related practical tasks.
Learners can comprehend and summarize English texts at the level of scientific abstracts with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can understand and perform English oral instructions for science experiment procedures in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.

resources: Science Domain English Learning Materials Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
